Name: Night Hunter
About the game: Night Hunter provides a unique and exciting experience where you help farmers to protect their livestock by hunting damage causing animals and in return you will receive a fee that will help you upgrade your equipment. You will hunt these predators from the back of a truck with a swivel shooting chair, a gun, light and a caller. Do you have what it takes to outsmart these sly predators and to become the next ultimate Night Hunter? Key features: Progress through multiple levels where the predators become more and more sly. Earn money for each predator eliminated. Earn more money with head shots. Upgrade your equipment with the money earned. Global top 100 rankings to compare your skills with other players
